select log_no , developer_name , modification_content , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as enroll_date
from ( select log_no, developer_name, modification_content,enroll_date from admin_log order by rownum desc) where rownum = 1

select dp.dep_name , round((count(dep_name)/(select max(count(department)) from member where status in ('Y','A') group by department))* 100) as countByMaxMem from department dp join (select department from member where status in ('Y','A')) mb on(dp.dep_name = mb.department) group by dp.dep_name having dep_name != '대표이사' order by (case dep_name when '경영관리본부' then '1' when '인사팀' then '2' when '총무팀' then '3' when '회계팀' then '4' when '개발본부' then '5' else '6' end), (case dep_name when '개발1팀' then '1' when '개발2팀' then '2' when '인프라팀' then '3' when '운영본부' then '4' when '운영팀' then '5' when '구매팀' then '6' else '7'end)

select dp.dep_name as dep_name , count(dep_name) as dep_mem_count , (select count(*) from member where status in ('Y','A')) as dep_class from department dp join (select department from member where status in ('Y','A')) mb on(dp.dep_name = mb.department) group by dp.dep_name having dep_name != '대표이사' order by (case dep_name when '경영관리본부' then '1' when '인사팀' then '2' when '총무팀' then '3' when '회계팀' then '4' when '개발본부' then '5' else '6' end), (case dep_name when '개발1팀' then '1' when '개발2팀' then '2' when '인프라팀' then '3' when '운영본부' then '4' when '운영팀' then '5' when '구매팀' then '6' else '7'end)

select case when dp.parent_dep = '대표이사' then dep_name else dp.parent_dep end as parent_dep , dp.dep_name as dep_name , count(mem_no) - count(case when rank = '상무' or rank = '대표이사' then '임원' end) as total_employee , count(case when rank = '상무' or rank = '대표이사' then '임원' end) as total_officer from department dp join member mb on(mb.department = dp.dep_name) where mb.status in ('Y','A') group by dp.dep_name, dp.parent_dep order by case when dep_name = '경영관리본부' then 1 when dep_name = '인사팀' then 2 when dep_name = '총무팀' then 3 when dep_name = '회계팀' then 4 when dep_name = '개발본부' then 5 when dep_name = '개발1팀' then 6 when dep_name = '개발2팀' then 7 when dep_name = '인프라팀' then 8 when dep_name = '운영본부' then 9 when dep_name = '운영팀' then 10 when dep_name = '영업팀' then 11 when dep_name = '구매팀' then 12 end NULLS first
